#summary This is the RoomWare Server all-in-one howto
#labels Featured,Phase-Deploy

= How to run =

First unzip all the files, then:

==Windows==
  # open a Command Prompt
  # go to the unzipped directory
  # type 'bin\run.bat'


==OSX==
  # open a Terminal
  # go to the unzipped directory
  # type 'bin/run'


= What's included? =
  # !RoomWare Server Specification
  # !RoomWare Server Implementation
  # Bluetooth Module
  # Rfid Module
  # Fake Module
  # Console Communicator
  # Http Communicator
